content.question: If <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> is the function defined by <math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction x squared plus 1, over f of x" overflow="scroll"> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>, what is the value of <math alttext="g prime of 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> ?
